about_the_game:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside Steam.

This bundle includes the Chinese Nakajima Ki-43-Ic fighter! The aircraft's maneuverability is the envy of any fighter, and therefore it's at home in dynamic battles at low altitudes. The Ki-43-Ic is able to outpace most of the aircraft in its tier, and its machine guns are always ready to support an ally with dense fire. Even the most agile enemies won't be able to escape its multiple machine guns! In addition, you will receive days of Premium Account that will make your in-game experience more enjoyable! You will also get a thematic emblem that gives a bonus (crew experience in each battle: +2%). Don't miss this great opportunity!

DLC Content:

  • Nakajima Ki-43-Ic, a Chinese Tier IV fighter

  • 1 Hangar slot

  • 1 crew trained to 100%

  • 3 days of Premium Account
detailed_description:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside Steam.

This bundle includes the Chinese Nakajima Ki-43-Ic fighter! The aircraft's maneuverability is the envy of any fighter, and therefore it's at home in dynamic battles at low altitudes. The Ki-43-Ic is able to outpace most of the aircraft in its tier, and its machine guns are always ready to support an ally with dense fire. Even the most agile enemies won't be able to escape its multiple machine guns! In addition, you will receive days of Premium Account that will make your in-game experience more enjoyable! You will also get a thematic emblem that gives a bonus (crew experience in each battle: +2%). Don't miss this great opportunity!

DLC Content:

  • Nakajima Ki-43-Ic, a Chinese Tier IV fighter

  • 1 Hangar slot

  • 1 crew trained to 100%

  • 3 days of Premium Account

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2xxx or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shaders 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 512MB, Radeon HD 3870) / higher)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2ххх, AMD FX 8xxx / higherShaders 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 512MB, Radeon HD 3870) / higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 1GB, Radeon HD 7870 / higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768
